Class CatalogController

java.lang.Object
com.ecomweb.online.da.DA.controller.CatalogController
@Controller public class CatalogController extends Object
Controller class for managing product catalog-related functionality. Handles catalog viewing, searching, filtering, and pagination.

  • Method Details

    • viewCatalog

      @GetMapping("/catalog") public String viewCatalog(@RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="false") boolean edit, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the catalog with all available products.
      Parameters:
      edit - Indicates if the catalog is in edit mode.
      model - Spring model object for passing data to the view.
      Returns:
      The Thymeleaf template name for the catalog.

    • searchProducts

      @GetMapping("/products/search") public String searchProducts(@RequestParam("name") String name, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Searches products by name and displays them.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the product to search.
      model - Spring model object for passing data to the view.
      Returns:
      The Thymeleaf template name for the catalog.

    • deleteProduct

      @GetMapping("/product-delete/{id}") public String deleteProduct(@PathVariable int id)
      Deletes a product by its ID and redirects to the catalog page.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the product to delete.
      Returns:
      A redirect to the catalog page in edit mode.

    • updateProduct

      @GetMapping("/products/update-product") public String updateProduct()
      Displays the product update form.
      Returns:
      The Thymeleaf template name for updating products.

    • filterProductsByColor

      @GetMapping("/products/filter") public String filterProductsByColor(@RequestParam("color") String color, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Filters products by color and displays the results.
      Parameters:
      color - The color to filter products by.
      model - Spring model object for passing data to the view.
      Returns:
      The Thymeleaf template name for the catalog.

    • viewPaginatedCatalog

      @GetMapping("/catalog-paginated") public String viewPaginatedCatalog(@RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="false") boolean edit, @PageableDefault(size=3) org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays a paginated catalog of products.
      Parameters:
      edit - Indicates if the catalog is in edit mode.
      pageable - The Pageable object containing pagination information.
      model - Spring model object for passing data to the view.
      Returns:
      The Thymeleaf template name for the paginated catalog.
